sent.orig: Guangzhou Customs Announcement: to issue the external announcement of the Customs General Administration and Guangzhou Customs.
sent.trans: 穗关通告：发布海关总署和广州海关对外的公告。

sent.orig: Still announcement week's announcement was a surprise.
sent.trans: 然而，上周的宣告仍然令人意外。

sent.orig: Give now announcement, carry out since the day of announcement oneself.
sent.trans: 现予以公告，自公告之日起实施。

sent.orig: Still, last week's announcement announcement was a surprise.
sent.trans: 然而，上周的声明却让人颇感意外。

sent.orig: Type in the Value column to edit the metadata elements for your announcement.
sent.trans: 在“值”列中键入值，为您的公告编辑元数据元素。
